name: Crescendo (Matthieu Osten)
description:
------ CRESCENDO------

In space a fight is raging in the middle of the debris two robots are fighting to know which one will have the rhythm in his skin! It's up to you to control the little astronaut robot and avoid the evil of a mad violinist.

------ CONTROLS ------ ------ CREDITS------

Dev - Theo VICINI
Dev - Matthieu OSTEN
Artist  - Manille BRUN
Artist  - Alix GRANLIN
Artist  - Benjamin HEINK
Artist - Agathe ROUX
